Package com.marginallyclever.ro3.mesh.proceduralmesh

Class CircleXY

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.ro3.mesh.Mesh
com.marginallyclever.ro3.mesh.proceduralmesh.ProceduralMesh
com.marginallyclever.ro3.mesh.proceduralmesh.CircleXY
public class CircleXY extends ProceduralMesh

CircleXY is a Mesh in the XY plane. The first vertex is the center so that it can be drawn as a triangle fan.
